content.title: This website aims to help Korean learners by providing lessons related to Korean vocabulary and grammar.
content.details: My name is Tong Zou. I'm an engineer at BitTorrent Inc, and I learn Korean in my spare time. I created this website in Feb 2013 to help myself learn Korean, and since then I have expanded this website to help other people who might be interested to learn Korean as well. This project is open source. The full code can be found in my Github account.
